trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hillsboro
There were no other sightings in Hillsboro on or around June 26th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsX-wife spotted Stationary orb at chemtrail altitude, then another, drove to home 3 minutes away, grabbed digital camera took some stills, then grabbed video camera and put it on tri-pod and pointed it in general direction of orbs. Upon review, orbs were caught on video, popping up out of chemtrail, up, stop, dart up and to the right at unbelievable speed. Half hour of video with references, bugs, birds, lens refraction, and two clearly visable orbs, one demonstrating multi directional, unbelievable speed.
Summary: Orbs visually spotted, then captured with video camera,
